title: Here's when and where you can watch the Mrs South Africa pageant on TV
text:
Here's when and where you can watch the Mrs South Africa pageant on TV share this

Cape Town - Mrs South Africa 2020 will take place on 8 November, and here is everything you need to know about the pageant.

The judges will select just one lady, out of the 25 finalists, to walk away with the title Tammy Taylor Mrs South Africa 2020, on 8 November at Emperors Palace in the City of Ekurhuleni.

THE JUDGES:

This year's panel of judges includes Mrs World 2018 Alice Lee Giannetta, Mrs South Africa 2018 Nicole Capper, Shashi Naidoo, LeAnne Dlamini, Mrs South Africa 2017 Hlengiwe Twala, CEO of Tammy Taylor Nails South Africa Mel Viljoen and businessman Vuzi Zwane.

THE ENTERTAINMENT:

The prestigious Grand Finale 2019 promises to be a spectacular production featuring top South African celebrities, Katlego Maboe, as the MC, and the talented and beautiful Lady Zamar, as entertainment for the night.

The Mrs South Africa brand showcases the virtues of the country, the spirit of Ubuntu and the modern woman who is relatable to the country.

THE PRIZES:

The new queen will become an ambassador for SABC 3, represent South Africa at Mrs World in Las Vegas on 6 December and win prizes to the value of over R1m, including a car from Suzuki South Africa.

TICKETS AND WHERE TO WATCH:

For those who would like to witness the crowning of the new Tammy Taylor Mrs SA 2020, tickets are available at Computicket here.

Tammy Taylor Mrs South Africa 2019 will be broadcast on the 10 November at 18:30 on SABC 3.

Compiled by Graye Morkel
